name: A burnished golden chestplate
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity slightly.
It increases the users intelligence slightly.
It has nice armour class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'throw'.
It increases the users acid resistance adequately.
